TextSplitterPipe
PipesTranslator
Breaks up the text input in blocks of a maximum length. By default, the maximum block length is 160 characters, to enable them to be sent as SMS messages.
See also
Github - TextSplitterPipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.TextSplitterPipe
Syntax
Copy
<TextSplitterPipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
maxBlockLength	number	160
Set the maximum number of characters of a block
softSplit	boolean	false
If true, try to break up the message at spaces, instead of in the middle of words
